text.text: In order to harness the full power of the gem, you'll need to strike it with lightning. A trident may be essental for creating one. This charges with gem with all the power it will need. According to the legends, anyway.

Then, after getting the full power of the gem, you can then use it to create the most powerful tools. The tools, according to legends, cannot be reparied in anyway. However, they have the ability to take out mountains. They are all capable of instant-mine of any of their blocks.
